WorkItem.Description:
Having the FileDotEngine Run method automatically append a ".dot" extension may seem nice, but it can lead to an awkward situation. Take this for example a user provides, from the command line, the path to a file, when the user looks for the file they expect to find it, but instead they find the file they specified plus the ".dot" extension
 
Ex.
command /in:graphData.txt /out:C:\temp\graphData.gv
would cause the file C:\temp\graphData.gv.dot to be created instead. 
 
I've attached a updated version of FileDotEngine.cs.
 
Thanks,
Reid Hochstedler
WorkItem.Summary: FileDotEngine Run method should not automatically append ".dot" file extension.
